metadata.title: The Potential - Multiverse Edition
metadata.author: Lucaspec72, 5thHorseman
metadata.description: This addon is a revival of the Potential mod. Still in it's infancy, it currently Reimplements the original ship, as well as a new MV variant, along with thruster animations ! Planned features : Add support for the new ship systems introduced by Multiverse. Add Variants of the Potential MV.
